title: Our First Date
description: The night the first time we met

constellations.description: Like a child
I was so nervous at first kkkk, but it was the best date ever
Remember when you broke your glasses?
Can't take our first kiss out of my mind
I hope you liked the wine from Bordeaux
I loved learning about your music taste in the Airbnb
I was a bit nervous for our first fuck kkkkk maybe it was not the best but still I loved it
The first time I ate doce de leite. Churros were sooooooo goooooood
Remember we had to go to the pharmacy before the date kkkk
Every time I turn my head I can see the gift you gave me and think of you
Everything was so good, thanks for the choice of this restaurant
HIIIIIII

title: Spoiler Bar
description: The night we went to the bar

constellations.description: The Moscow mule was so good at Brita Bar
Loved the vibe of the bar, the cocktails were so pretty
Miss you so much
I dodged all the spoilers because I don't speak Portuguese hehe

title: My place
description: The first time you met my friends

constellations.description: As always I was nervous for you to meet my friends kkkkkk, hope you liked them
Can't wait to cook carbonara pasta for you again
Thanks for cooking me the best brigadeiro ever, I loved it
Remember when my friends were noisy just to cringe me? kkkkkk
I can still smell the smell of the croc frango we ate. I was so stinky in my friend's room
It was so good skipping UFRGS work to be with you
Loved meeting your cats!
The first time I ate capyburger, it was so good
So happy when I finished the purple route
It was nice meeting your friend even if my English was bad this day kkkk
The xis was really goooooood

title: Okpo & Travessa
description: Yet another date where we ate a lot

constellations.description: You were so pretty this night
Loved the food but it was so spicy kkkk I couldn't even finish it
It was great partying with you even if we didn't go to Cucko. Hope you liked my friends
Hated Uber soooo much this night kkkkk no one wanted to take me home
Look how pretty we were this night
Please bring me a burger from Capyburger it was sooooo good
Can't wait to be in a jacuzzi with you again
The bed was so comfy, I loved it
Loved to watch The Office with you
You're my star
This night was the best fuck of my life kkkkk loved it
